amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that legislation affecting entitlement programs in which States participate voluntarily, shall not be considered as imposing a Federal unfunded mandate as defined in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that legislation affecting entitlement programs in which states participate voluntarily, shall not be considered as imposing a federal unfunded mandate as defined in the bill. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 96 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mink amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 310 (Roll no. 77).
